alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 2:58PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, northeastern Alachua, northwestern Putnam and southwestern Clay Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 258 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Orange Heights to Hawthorne. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, half inch hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Starke, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Melrose, Hawthorne, Lake Geneva, Florahome, Camp Blanding, Melrose Landing and Orange Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
